segments.text: Have you any tour route to Budapest ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have , sir . How long are you going on vacation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I recommend you this route . We call it golden routes for the sightseeing spots .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , will you offer me any reduction since it's a out-of-season tour ?
segments.speaker: S1
